Datos.Consulta: select A.id as idArt,E.id as idEl,U.id as idUbic,A.Marca as marca,A.Modelo as modelo,E.numSerie as numserie, E.fechaCompra as fechaCompra,A.Descripcion as descripcion,E.Cantidad as cantidad, E.Cantidad as cantReal, 'N' as Baja from Elementos E, Articulos A, Ubicaciones U where A.id=E.id_Articulo and U.id=E.id_Ubicacion and U.id='{id}' order by A.descripcion;
